content:
I'd be happy to help you keep track of your schedule and commitments.

Let's start with your regular rehearsal schedule. I've noted down that you have rehearsals every Tuesday and Thursday from 7 pm to 10 pm at the local community theater.

Now, what other commitments do you have coming up? Do you have any appointments, meetings, events, or tasks that you need to schedule around your rehearsals? Please share them with me, and I'll help you organize your schedule for the next few weeks.
